bed with a bit of toast so long as i didnt do it on the knife for bad luck or if the woman was go her round with the watercress and someth nice and tasti there are a few oliv in the kitchen he might like i never could bear the look of them in abrin i could do the criada the room look all right sinc i chang it the other way you see someth was tell me all the time id have to introduc myself not know me from adam veri funni wouldnt it im his wife or pretend we were in spain with him half awak without a god notion where he is dos huevo estrellado senor lord the crack thing come into my head sometim itd be great fun suppos he stay with us whi not there the room upstair empti and milli bed in the back room he could do his write and studi at the tabl in there for all the scribbl he doe at it and if he want to read in bed in the morn like me as hes make the breakfast for i he can make it for 2 im sure im not go to take in lodger off the street for him if he take a gesabo of a hous like this id love to have a long talk with an intellig welleduc person id have to get a nice pair of red slipper like those turk with the fez use to sell or yellow and a nice semitranspar morn gown that i bad want or a peachblossom dress jacket like the one long ago in walpol onli 8/6 or 18/6 ill just give him one more chanc ill get up earli in the morn im sick of cohen old bed in ani case i might go over to the market to see all the veget and cabbag and tomato and carrot and all kind of splendid fruit all come in love and fresh who know whod be the 1st man id meet theyr out look for it in the morn mami dillon use to say they are and the night too that was her massgo id love a big juici pear now to melt in your mouth like when i use to be in the long way then ill throw him up his egg and tea in the moustachecup she gave him to make his mouth bigger i suppos hed like my nice cream too i know what ill do ill go about rather gay not too much sing a bit now and then mi fa pieta masetto then ill start dress myself to go out presto non son piu fort ill put on my best shift and drawer let him have a good eye out of that to make his micki stand for him ill let him know if that what he want that his wife is i s l o fuck yes and damn well fuck too up to my neck near not by him 5 or 6 time handrun there the mark of his spunk on the clean sheet i wouldnt bother to even iron it out that ought to satisfi him if you dont believ me feel my belli unless i made him stand there and put him into me ive a mind to tell him everi scrap and make him do it out in front of me serv him right it all his own fault if i am an adulteress as the thing in the galleri said o much about it if that all the harm ever we did in this vale of tear god know it not much doesnt everybodi onli they hide it i suppos that what a woman is suppos to be there for or he wouldnt have made us the way he did so attract to men then if he want to kiss my bottom ill drag open my drawer and bulg it right out in his face as larg as life he can stick his tongu 7 mile up my hole as hes there my brown part then ill tell him i want li or perhap 30/ ill tell him i want to buy undercloth then if he give me that well he wont be too bad i dont want to soak it all out of him like other women do i could often have written out a fine chequ for myself and write his name on it for a coupl of pound a few time he forgot to lock it up besid he wont spend it ill let him do it off on me behind provid he doesnt smear all my good drawer o i suppos that cant be help ill do the indiffer l or 2 question ill know by the answer when hes like that he cant keep a thing back i know everi turn in him ill tighten my bottom well and let out a few smutti word smellrump or lick my shit or the first mad thing come into my head then ill suggest about yes o wait now sonni my turn is come ill be quit gay and friend over it o but i was forget this bloodi pest of a thing pfooh you wouldnt know which to laugh or cri were such a mixtur of plum and appl no ill have to wear the old thing so much the better itll be more point hell never know whether he did it or not there that good enough for you ani old thing at all then ill wipe him off me just like a busi his omiss then ill go out ill have him eye up at the ceil where is she gone now make him want me that the onli way a quarter after what an unearth hour i suppos theyr just get up in china now comb out their pigtail for the day well soon have the nun ring the angelus theyv nobodi come in to spoil their sleep except an odd priest or two for his night offic or the alarmclock next door at cockshout clatter the brain out of itself let me see if i can doze off 1 2 3 4 5 what kind of flower are those they invent like the star the wallpap in lombard street was much nicer the apron he gave me was like that someth onli i onli wore it twice better lower this lamp and tri again so as i can get up earli ill go to lamb there besid findlat and get them to send us some flower to put about the place in case he bring him home tomorrow today i mean no no friday an unlucki day first i want to do the place up someway the dust grow in it i think while im asleep then we can have music and cigarett i can accompani him first i must clean the key of the piano with milk whatll i wear shall i wear a white rose or those fairi cake in lipton i love the smell of a rich big shop at 7 1/2d a lb or the other one with the cherri in them and the pinki sugar i id a coupl of lbs of those a nice plant for the middl of the tabl id get that cheaper in wait where this i saw them not long ago i love flower id love to have the whole place swim in rose god of heaven there noth like natur the wild mountain then the sea and the wave rush then the beauti countri with the field of oat and wheat and all kind of thing and all the fine cattl go about that would do your heart good to see river and lake and flower all sort of shape and smell and colour spring up even out of the ditch primros and violet natur it is as for them say there no god i wouldnt give a snap of my two finger for all their learn whi dont they go and creat someth i often ask him atheist or whatev they call themselv go and wash the cobbl off themselv first then they go howl for the priest and they die and whi whi becaus theyr afraid of hell on account of their bad conscienc ah yes i know them well who was the first person in the univers befor there was anybodi that made it all who ah that they dont know neither do i so there you are they might as well tri to stop the sun from rise tomorrow the sun shine for you he said the day we were lie among the rhododendron on howth head in the grey tweed suit and his straw hat the day i got him to propos to me yes first i gave him the bit of seedcak out of my mouth and it was leapyear like now yes 16 year ago my god after that long kiss i near lost my breath yes he said i was a flower of the mountain yes so we are flower all a woman bodi yes that was one true thing he said in his life and the sun shine for you today yes that was whi i like him becaus i saw he understood or felt what a woman is and i knew i could alway get round him and i gave him all the pleasur i could lead him on till he ask me to say yes and i wouldnt answer first onli look out over the sea and the sky i was think of so mani thing he didnt know of mulvey and mr stanhop and hester and father and old captain grove and the sailor play all bird fli and i say stoop and wash up dish they call it on the pier and the sentri in front of the governor hous with the thing round his white helmet poor devil half roast and the spanish girl laugh in their shawl and their tall comb and the auction in the morn the greek and the jew and the arab and the devil know who els from all the end of europ and duke street and the fowl market all cluck outsid larbi sharon and the poor donkey slip half asleep and the vagu fellow in the cloak asleep in the shade on the step and the big wheel of the cart of the bull and the old castl thousand of year old yes and those handsom moor all in white and turban like king ask you to sit down in their littl bit of a shop and ronda with the old window of the posada 2 glanc eye a lattic hid for her lover to kiss the iron and the wineshop half open at night and the castanet and the night we miss the boat at algecira the watchman go about seren with his lamp and o that aw deepdown torrent o and the sea the sea crimson sometim like fire and the glorious sunset and the figtre in the alameda garden yes and all the queer littl street and the pink and blue and yellow hous and the rosegarden and the jessamin and geranium and cactus and gibraltar as a girl where i was a flower of the mountain yes when i put the rose in my hair like the andalusian girl use or shall i wear a red yes and how he kiss me under the moorish wall and i thought well as well him as anoth and then i ask him with my eye to ask again yes and then he ask me would i yes to say yes my mountain flower and first i put my arm around him yes and drew him down to me so he could feel my breast all perfum yes and his heart was go like mad and yes i said yes i will yes triest zurich pari 1914 1921
